name: vite-react-form-builder
description: A Vite + React form builder starter template

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && pnpm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: ln -sf dist/assets assets 2>/dev/null || true && ln -sf dist/fonts fonts 2>/dev/null || true && ln -sf dist/img img 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'âœ“ Build complete - symlinks created for DDEV (nginx) | .htaccess ready for Apache'
